body_html:
Looks like this is caused by the change in #13482. In particular the line

pytorch/test/cpp_extensions/setup.py

Line 12 in 7b9d755

extra_compile_args=CXX_FLAGS),
brings in the extra flags : -DTORCH_API_INCLUDE_EXTENSION_H -DTORCH_EXTENSION_NAME=cuda . If I bring it back to look like extra_compile_args=['-g']), it works.

Does this not fail on x86 ?
body_text:
Looks like this is caused by the change in #13482.  In particular the line 
  
    
      pytorch/test/cpp_extensions/setup.py
    
    
         Line 12
      in
      7b9d755
    
    
    
    

        
          
           extra_compile_args=CXX_FLAGS), 
        
    
  

    brings in the extra  flags :  -DTORCH_API_INCLUDE_EXTENSION_H -DTORCH_EXTENSION_NAME=cuda    .  If I bring it back to   look like       extra_compile_args=['-g']),   it works.
Does this not fail on x86 ?
body:
Looks like this is caused by the change in #13482.  In particular the line https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/7b9d755d88d708e5ee25f5990e0a24733552f659/test/cpp_extensions/setup.py#L12    brings in the extra  flags :  -DTORCH_API_INCLUDE_EXTENSION_H -DTORCH_EXTENSION_NAME=cuda    .  If I bring it back to   look like       extra_compile_args=['-g']),   it works.

Does this not fail on x86 ?
